transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello Patel sir, meeting aapko gaya hua hai aap join kar lijiye India mart ka.
Customer: Mam maine unko bola tha mujhe karna wapas kam aa gaya mujhe.
Executive: Aur abhi sir, paanch 10 minute de dijiye please.
Customer: Sir nahi ho payega wo pata to maine unko tab bhi phone kara bole lunch time hai to bole 10 minute baad karta hu.
Executive: Sir bahut matlab jyada time nahi lungi main aapka bas aap 10 minute de sakte hain.
Customer: Kal morning me ho payega.
Executive: Ha nahi nahi sir abhi kar lo 10 minute.
Customer: Kal kal morning me kal minute.
Executive: Kal kal morning.
Executive: Are kal morning me.
Executive: Sir abhi possible nahi hai 10 minute paanch minute abhi possible nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi kal ek to ye main matlab phone se join karunga chalega.
Executive: Ha ha chalega sir any time barabar chalega bas aap 10 minute de do.
Customer: 7 baje ke aas pass.
Executive: Raat ke time nahi sir office time hi sir 9 to six hai jyada se jyada main aapke liye 6:30 baith jaungi.
Customer: Mam ya to kal morning me ek bar kar lo na ho jaye to.
Executive: Kal morning me kitne baje sir?
Customer: Aap mujhe 10 baje kar kar lena main free ho jaunga.
Executive: Achcha abhi ek bhi pratishat chance nahi hai.
Customer: Ha?
Executive: Abhi ek bhi pratishat chance nahi hai sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi to kuch bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir thik hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to attend meeting due to work.

- Customer asks to reschedule for the next day.



Resolution:

- Executive requested customer to join for 10 minutes.

- Executive offered to stay till 6:30 PM.

- Executive asked customer to join via phone.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next day at 10 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting, reschedule, time
